Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product not only boasts a wide array of features but also stands out in its quality and functionality, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to enhance their experience. Considering its exceptional value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $200 for this item. I believe this offer reflects both the product's worth and provides you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
